img.alt: Jenkins Computers Being Used to Combat COVID-19

h3.a: Jenkins Computers Being Used to Combat COVID-19

div.p: For over 15 years, Jenkins Independent has partnered with Dataseam to provide students and staff with high quality Apple workstations. The computational power of these computers, in conjunction...
Mrs. Angie Church has been very busy during our COVID NTI days. She has been more than willing to help in several different roles outside of the usual job she does in the office. Mrs. Angie...
Kentucky Interim Commissioner Kevin Brown has shared a message to Kentucky's public school families in the following letter. https://5il.co/eypg

Cavalier Families we would like to remind you that we will deliver lunches for students on Tuesdays and Fridays. We will leave JHS at 1:00, so please add 2-hours to your old delivery schedule and allow a few extra minutes since we are giving multiple meals to each student! Remember today you will pick up for Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday! This process may take us a few extra minutes so please don’t leave your stop, we will be there as soon as possible. Thank you!
Thursday, April 2nd and Friday, April 3rd will be regular NTI days for Jenkins Independent. These days were originally scheduled as Spring Break in the calendar.
The regular Jenkins Board of Education meeting scheduled for March 24th at 6:30 PM has been cancelled. An upcoming special meeting will be announced soon.

​Spring pictures will take place tomorrow at JMHS. Afterwards, team pictures will be taken for middle and high school baseball, high school softball, ​middle school volleyball, track, and golf. Individual sports pictures can be taken should you want to purchase them.

The Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services is closely monitoring and reporting on the COVID-19 situation in Kentucky. You can keep up to date on this information by visiting the following link: https://chfs.ky.gov/agencies/dph/pages/covid19.aspx
There will be no school tomorrow, Friday, March 6th, in the Jenkins Independent School System. It will be an NTI day.
There will be school in the Jenkins Independent Schools on Friday March 13th. There will be no school on May 19th due to primary election.
